meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lillie Salsberry Tom Parker Robert Morgan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4428.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Lillie Salsberry, a librarian from Baton Rouge, Louisiana
Tom Parker, a documentary filmmaker from Providence, Rhode Island
Robert Morgan, a high school teacher from San Juan Capistrano, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,500)

tr.td: THE CIVIL WAR
'70s HITS
2 MUCH
"DEF" JAM
TAILS
OF THE SOUTH PACIFIC
